entities.name: ron
entities.description: One of the main characters who is struggling to get up from his fall. He collided with his thestral and almost fell over again.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: One of the main characters who touched down on either side of Ron and slid off her mount more gracefully than him.

entities.name: ginny
entities.description: One of the main characters who touched down on either side of Ron and slid off her mount more gracefully than him.

entities.name: neville
entities.description: One of the main characters who jumped down from his mount, shaking.

entities.name: luna
entities.description: One of the main characters who dismounted smoothly and asked Harry where they should go next.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: The leader of the group who gave his thestral a quick pat and led the way to the telephone box.

entities.name: thestral
entities.description: A magical creature that Ron collided with and Harry patted before leading the group away from it.

relationships.description: Ron collided with the thestral and almost fell over again.
Harry gave his thestral a quick, grateful pat before leading the group away from it.
